attributes.action: lower the age of screening in england for bowel cancer from 60 to  50 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
bowel cancer is one of the cancers that if caught early has a great record of cure.
In england the age for screening is 60 to 69 years.
In scotland it is 50 to 74 years.
In wales it is also 50 to 74 years.
As englands screening age is 10 years later than scotland and wales hundreds of lives could be lost.
As all these screenings are nhs why is england different from scotland and wales.?
I propose screening age to be lowered in england to 50 years. Please sign this lifesaving petition thankyou.
